snippet: Lee Sung-woo, an avid Royals fan from South Korea, arrived last week for his first visit to Kansas City; since then, the team has lavished him with attention — and has won seven of eight games.
abstract: Rany Jazayerli Essay on Lee Sung-woo, avid South Korean super-fan of Kansas City Royals who visited team in Kansas City after years of following and writing about them from afar; notes that team has lavished Lee with attention, including allowing him to throw out a first pitch, and has played exceptionally well since his arrival from South Korea.
lead_paragraph: Lee Sung-woo, an avid Royals fan from South Korea, arrived last week for his first visit to Kansas City; since then, the team has lavished him with attention — and has won seven of eight games.

headline.main: A Fan Visits From Afar, and the Royals Come Alive
headline.print_headline: A Fan Visits From Afar, and the Royals Come Alive
